content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: RPPLDY
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000059
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when RPPLDY is present.
Outcome:
  Message: RPPLDY is present.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0632
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: RPPLDY is not be used in human clinical trials.
                Document: SDTM v2.0
                Section: Timing
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when RPPLDY is present.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: RPPLDY is not be used in human clinical trials.
